name: Memory Search
description:
Welcome to Memory Search.

This was my second game jam and I really enjoyed working on this project.

I didn't have much time this week so there are some bugs that I'm aware of but couldn't fix in time.

Please leave your feadback in the comment. 

If you think a piece of the game is missing you have to search for it in the level because everything is there. That's why it is an adventure game.
